name: ShooterGame
description:
My first ever game I hope you like it. I don't think the multiplayer works right now but might work in the near future.

THIS GAME IS FOR WINDOWS 64BIT ONLY!

THIS GAME HAS BEEN CANCELED NO MORE UPDATES BECAUSE UNREAL MESSED UN AND IT DELETED THE GAME FILES BUT I WILL BE WORKING ON A GAME IN UNITY 2D AND IT WILL BE A 2D PLATFORMER , and I I will try to release it on December 25, 2017 (no guaranties though because I will probably be making it on Thanksgiving  and working on it with my Nana or my CUZ or by myself I don't know yet)! Hope yall can come along with me and get the game and I will try to get it on steam, Bye and have a great day

THEGAMERNATION59 studios!
